descriptions.location: Dirty plates are piled high on the table in the centre of the kitchen.
descriptions.location.suffix: There is a door that leads into a pantry.
descriptions.contains.bray.pan: A squat black iron stove sits in the corner, a battered and dented pan rests on top.
descriptions.missing.bray.pan: A squat black iron stove sits in the corner.

descriptions.detailed: You remove the lid of the pan and look inside. There is a coagulated grey mass at the bottom. It might once have been porridge, but it could just as easily have been some sort of a stew. You are not in any kind of hurry to sample it.
descriptions.drop.bray.kitchen: You put the pan back onto the stove.
